metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0996 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in the 389 Directory Server that allows expired passwords to access the database to cause improper authentication.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
